silver.name: AFK
silver.desc: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 20 gold.

silver.name: Team Building
silver.desc:
Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator. Gain another after 5 player combats.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

silver.name: Backup
silver.desc: Your team gains 12% Attack Speed if at least 4 allies start combat in the back two rows.

silver.name: Band of Thieves I
silver.desc: Gain 1 Thief's Gloves.

silver.name: Caretaker's Ally
silver.desc: Gain a random 2-cost champion now. Gain the same one again every time you level up.

silver.name: Big Friend I
silver.desc: Your units that start combat next to an ally with over 1750 Health take 7% less damage for the rest of combat.

silver.name: Lunch Money
silver.desc:
Every 8 damage you deal to enemy tacticians gives you 2 gold.
Total Payouts: Gold

silver.name: Branching Out
silver.desc: Gain a random Emblem.

silver.name: Bulky Buddies I
silver.desc: Allies that start combat next to exactly 1 other ally gain 100 Health. When that champion dies, the other gains a 10% max Health Shield for 10 seconds.

silver.name: Called Shot
silver.desc: Set your win streak to 4. Gain 4 gold.

silver.name: Climb The Ladder I
silver.desc: Each time an ally dies, allies that share at least one trait with them gain 3 Ability Power, 3% Attack Damage, 3 Armor, and 3 Magic Resist.

silver.name: Rolling For Days I
silver.desc: Gain 11 free Shop rerolls.

silver.name: Corrosion
silver.desc: Enemy champions in the first two rows lose 3 Armor and Magic Resist every 2 seconds.

silver.name: Crafted Crafting
silver.desc: Whenever you craft a completed item, gain 2 rerolls.

silver.name: Component Buffet
silver.desc:
Whenever you would get a component, gain a component anvil instead. Gain a random component.

The anvil offers 4 choices.

silver.name: Cybernetic Implants I
silver.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 80 Health and 10% Attack Damage.

silver.name: Diversified Portfolio
silver.desc: Gain 1 gold. Each round, gain 1 gold for every 3 non-unique traits active.

silver.name: Diversified Portfolio+
silver.desc: Gain 4 gold. Each round, gain 1 gold for every 3 non-unique traits active.

silver.name: Stand United I
silver.desc: Your units gain 1.5% Attack Damage and 1.5 Ability Power for each non-unique Trait active across your team.

silver.name: Spoils of War I
silver.desc: Enemies have a 25% chance to drop loot when killed.

silver.name: Dummify
silver.desc: Lose all champions on your board and bench. Gain a Training Dummy with 80% of their combined health. The dummy gains 1000 Health per stage.

silver.name: Eye For An Eye
silver.desc: For every 15 ally champions that die, gain a random component (max 3).

silver.name: Eye For An Eye+
silver.desc: Gain a random component. For every 16 ally champions that die, gain another component (max 2).

silver.name: Find Your Center
silver.desc: Your champion that starts combat in the center of the front row gains 15% Damage Amp and 15% max Health.

silver.name: Fine Vintage
silver.desc: Completed items left on your bench for 4 rounds transform into Support Anvils.

silver.name: Firesale
silver.desc: Each round, steal a random 3-cost or lower champion from the shop. Gain 1 gold.

silver.name: Glass Cannon I
silver.desc: Units that start combat in the back row begin combat at 90% health but gain 13% Damage Amp.

silver.name: Good For Something I
silver.desc: Champions that aren't holding items have a 50% chance to drop 1 gold on death.

silver.name: Healing Orbs I
silver.desc: When an enemy dies, the nearest ally is healed for 200.

silver.name: Health is Wealth I
silver.desc: Your team gains 10% Omnivamp. Get a bonus of 8 gold when your team first accumulates 10000 total champion healing.

silver.name: Iron Assets
silver.desc: Gain a component anvil and 4 gold.

silver.name: Item Collector I
silver.desc: For each unique item they are holding, your team gains 1 Attack Damage and 1 Ability Power.

silver.name: Item Grab Bag I
silver.desc: Gain 1 random completed item.

silver.name: Kingslayer
silver.desc: After winning player combat, gain 1 gold. If they had more health than you, gain 6 Gold instead. Gain 1 gold.

silver.name: Lategame Specialist
silver.desc: When you reach Level 9, gain 33 gold.

silver.name: Lineup
silver.desc: Your team gains 2 Armor and Magic Resist for each unit that starts combat in the front two rows.

silver.name: Latent Forge
silver.desc:
After 8 player combats, gain an Artifact anvil.

The anvil offers 4 choices. Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

silver.name: Manaflow I
silver.desc: Your units that start combat in the back row gain 2 additional Mana per attack.

silver.name: Mentorship I
silver.desc: If an ally starts combat next to a higher-cost ally, it gains 10% Attack Speed and 100 Health.

silver.name: Missed Connections
silver.desc: Gain a copy of each 1-cost champion.

silver.name: One For All I
silver.desc: Your team gains 2% max Health and 1% Damage Amp for each unique one-cost champion on your board. Gain 2 one-costs.

silver.name: One, Two, Five!
silver.desc: Gain 1 random component, 2 gold, and 1 random 5-cost champion.

silver.name: Ones Twos Three
silver.desc: Gain 2 1-cost champion, 2 2-cost champions, and 1 3-cost champion.

silver.name: Over Encumbered
silver.desc: For the next stage, you only get 2 bench slots. After, get 2 item components.

silver.name: Pandora's Bench
silver.desc: At the start of every round, champions on the 3 rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost. Gain 2 gold.

silver.name: Pandora's Items
silver.desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain 1 random component.

silver.name: Patience is a Virtue
silver.desc: Each round, gain 2 free rerolls if you did not buy a champion last round.

silver.name: Placebo
silver.desc: Your team gains 1% Attack Speed. Gain 8 gold.

silver.name: Placebo+
silver.desc: Your team gains 1% Attack Speed. Gain 15 gold.

silver.name: Preparation I
silver.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 30 Health, 2% Attack Damage, and 2 Ability Power every round. Champions start with 1 stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

silver.name: Pumping Up I
silver.desc: Your team gains 6% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 0.5% more.

silver.name: Recombobulator
silver.desc: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 cost tier higher (max 5). Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

silver.name: Blistering Strikes
silver.desc: Your team's attacks Burn their targets for 5% of their max Health over 5 seconds. Attacks also reduce their targets' healing received by 33%.

silver.name: Rigged Shop+
silver.desc: Your next shop and every 4 shops will contain all 3-cost champions. Gain 5 rerolls.

silver.name: Risky Moves
silver.desc: Your Tactician loses 20 Health, but after 7 player combats, gain 30 gold.

silver.name: Silver Spoon
silver.desc: Gain 10 XP.

silver.name: Support Mining
silver.desc: Gain a Training Dummy. When it dies 8 times, gain a random Support Item and remove the Training Dummy.

silver.name: Support Mining+
silver.desc: Gain a Training Dummy. When it dies 7 times, gain a random Support Item and remove the Training Dummy.

silver.name: Survivor
silver.desc: After 3 players are eliminated, gain 92 gold.

silver.name: Table Scraps
silver.desc: After the next 2 carousels, gain one unit that was not taken and its item. Gain 1 gold.

silver.name: Teaming Up I
silver.desc: Gain 1 random component and 2 random Tier 3 champions.

silver.name: Titanic Titan
silver.desc: Increase your current and max player health by 25. On carousel rounds you are released earlier, but are much slower.

silver.name: Young and Wild and Free
silver.desc: You can always move freely on Carousel rounds. Gain 5 gold.

silver.name: Button Mash
silver.desc: Gain a Poppy. Your strongest Poppy's ability is replaced with a 3-hit Wallop.

silver.name: Cease and Desist
silver.desc: Gain a Vi. Your strongest Vi gains Attack Speed and her ability dashes to the farthest target within 3-hexes, Stuns, and deals bonus physical damage.

silver.name: Branching Out+
silver.desc:
Gain a random Emblem and a Reforger.

Reforgers allow you to remake any item.

silver.name: Wolf Unchained
silver.desc: Gain a Sylas. Your strongest Sylas's ability deals more damage and recasts on kill, but his Health gain no longer scales with Ability Power.

silver.name: Adaptive Strikes
silver.desc: Gain a Jax. Your strongest Jax's attacks deal bonus magic damage every 3rd attack which gets stronger each time. His ability grants Attack Speed.

gold.name: All That Shimmers
gold.desc: Choose a gold-generating Artifact items and gain a Magnetic Remover.

gold.name: All That Shimmers+
gold.desc: Choose a gold-generating Artifact. Gain a Magnetic Remover and 4 gold.

gold.name: A Magic Roll
gold.desc: Roll 3 dice. Gain rewards based on their total.

gold.name: Bad Luck Protection
gold.desc: Your team can no longer critically strike. Convert each 5% Critical Strike Chance into 5% Attack Damage. Gain a Sparring Gloves.

gold.name: Caretaker's Favor
gold.desc:
Gain a component anvil when you reach level 5, 6, 7, and 8.

The anvil offers 4 choices.

gold.name: Big Friend II
gold.desc: Your units that start combat next to an ally with over 1750 Health take 10% less damage for the rest of combat.

gold.name: Big Grab Bag
gold.desc:
Gain 3 random components, 2 gold, and 1 Reforger.

Reforgers allow you to remake any item.

gold.name: Blazing Soul I
gold.desc: Combat start: Your highest Attack Speed champion gains 20 Ability Power and 20% Attack Speed. Repeat on another ally every 3 seconds.

gold.name: BRB
gold.desc: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 2 completed item anvils.

gold.name: Bronze For Life I
gold.desc: Your team gains 3.5% Damage Amp for each Bronze-tier trait.

gold.name: Bulky Buddies II
gold.desc: Allies that start combat next to exactly 1 other ally gain 175 Health. When that champion dies, the other gains a 15% max Health Shield for 10 seconds.

gold.name: Calculated Loss
gold.desc: After losing your combat, gain 2 gold and a free Shop reroll.

gold.name: Clear Mind
gold.desc: If there are no champions on your bench at the end of player combat, gain 3 XP.

gold.name: Climb The Ladder II
gold.desc: Each time an ally dies, allies that share at least one trait with them gain 5 Ability Power, 5% Attack Damage, 5 Armor, and 5 Magic Resist.

gold.name: Clockwork Accelerator
gold.desc: Your team gains 10% Attack Speed every 3 seconds in combat.

gold.name: Cloning Facility
gold.desc: Empower the hex in the center of the third row. Summon a clone of the champion in it with 80% base Health and 10% increased Mana cost.

gold.name: Cluttered Mind
gold.desc: Gain 4 random 1-cost champions now. If your bench is full at the end of player combat, gain 3 XP.

gold.name: Ascension
gold.desc: After 15 seconds of combat, your units gain 60% Damage Amp.

gold.name: Cooking Pot
gold.desc: At the start of each turn, all units holding a Frying Pan or Spatula item grant the nearest champion 40 permanent Health. Gain a Frying Pan.

gold.name: Crown Guarded
gold.desc: Gain a Crownguard. Your Crownguards' start of combat effect is 85% stronger and the shield lasts 5 seconds longer.

gold.name: Crown's Will
gold.desc: Gain a Needlessly Large Rod. Your units gain 10 Ability Power and 8 Armor.

gold.name: Cybernetic Bulk II
gold.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 300 health.

gold.name: Cybernetic Implants II
gold.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and 20% Attack Damage.

gold.name: Cybernetic Uplink II
gold.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and restore 2 Mana per second.

gold.name: Spoils of War II
gold.desc: Enemies have a 30% chance to drop loot when killed.

gold.name: Duo Queue
gold.desc: Gain 2 random 5-cost champions and 2 copies of a random component.

gold.name: Epoch
gold.desc: Now, and at the start of every stage, gain 4 XP and 2 free rerolls.

gold.name: Epoch+
gold.desc: Now, and at the start of every stage, gain 8 XP and 3 free rerolls.

gold.name: Forward Thinking
gold.desc: Lose all your gold. After 5 player combats, gain back the original amount and another 70 gold.

gold.name: Glass Cannon II
gold.desc: Units that start combat in the back row begin combat at 90% health but gain 20% Damage Amp.

gold.name: Gold For Dummies
gold.desc: Gain a Training Dummy. Every 10 seconds, all Training Dummies grant 1 gold.

gold.name: Golemify
gold.desc: Lose all champions on your board and bench. Gain a Golem with 60% of their combined Health and 50% of their combined Attack Damage. The Golem gains 1000 Health per stage.

gold.name: Healing Orbs II
gold.desc: When an enemy dies, the nearest ally is healed for 400.

gold.name: Health is Wealth II
gold.desc: Your team gains 15% Omnivamp. Get a bonus of 15 gold when your team first accumulates 10000 total champion healing.

gold.name: Heroic Grab Bag
gold.desc:
Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators. Gain 7 gold.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

gold.name: High Voltage
gold.desc: Gain an Ionic Spark. Your Ionic Sparks have +3 hex radius and do 15% more damage.

gold.name: Hustler
gold.desc:
You earn no interest, but gain 3 gold at the start of every player combat round. Gain 3 gold now.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

gold.name: Inspiring Epitaph
gold.desc: When a unit dies, the nearest ally gains a 20% max Health Shield and 8% stacking Attack Speed.

gold.name: Investment Strategy I
gold.desc: Your champions gain 7 permanent max health per interest you earn.

gold.name: Item Collector II
gold.desc: Your team gains 20 Health. For each unique item they are holding, your team gains bonus 5 Health, 1 Attack Damage, and 1 Ability Power.

gold.name: Last Stand
gold.desc: The first time you would be eliminated, you escape death and your team permanently gains 150 Health, 10 Armor and Magic Resist, and 10% Omnivamp.

gold.name: Patient Study
gold.desc: After player combat, gain 2 XP if you won or 3 XP if you lost.

gold.name: Little Buddies
gold.desc: Your 4-cost and 5-cost champions gain 55 Health and 6% Attack Speed for every 1-cost and 2-cost champion on your board.

gold.name: Long Distance Pals
gold.desc: Combat start: Your 2 units furthest from each other form a bond, sharing 22% of their Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Damage, and Ability Power with each other.

gold.name: Mace's Will
gold.desc: Gain a Sparring Gloves. Your team gains 6% Attack Speed and 20% Critical Strike Chance.

gold.name: Malicious Monetization
gold.desc: Gain 2 gold. For the next 3 rounds, enemy champions drop 2 gold when killed.

gold.name: Manaflow II
gold.desc: Your units that start combat in the back row gain 3 additional Mana per attack.

gold.name: Mentorship II
gold.desc: If an ally starts combat next to a higher-cost ally, it gains 16% Attack Speed and 220 Health.

gold.name: Moonlight
gold.desc: Combat start: 1 random 1-cost champion is upgraded to 3-star for that round and gains 45% Attack Damage and 45 Ability Power.

gold.name: Noble Sacrifice
gold.desc: When your first ally dies each combat, grant your team 25 + 10% of that ally's Armor and Magic Resistance.

gold.name: NO SCOUT NO PIVOT
gold.desc: Units can no longer be benched or sold after fighting in a player combat. After each player combat, units that fought gain 14 Health, 2% Attack Damage, and 2% Ability Power.

gold.name: Not Today
gold.desc: Gain an Edge of Night. Champions holding this item gain 35% Attack Speed.

gold.name: One For All II
gold.desc: Your team gains 3% max Health and 1.5% Damage Amp for each unique one-cost champion on your board. Gain 3 one-costs.

gold.name: Overheal
gold.desc: Every third attack deals an additional 110% damage and heals 50% of the damage. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 300 Health.

gold.name: Pair of Fours
gold.desc: If your team has exactly 2 four-cost champions, they each gain 374 Health and 24.4% Attack Speed. Gain a random 4-cost.

gold.name: Pandora's Items II
gold.desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain 2 random components.

gold.name: Piercing Lotus I
gold.desc: Your team gains 5% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike. Critical strikes 20% Shred and Sunder the target for 3 seconds.

gold.name: Pilfer
gold.desc: Each round, gain a 1-star copy of the first champion you killed last combat.

gold.name: Portable Forge
gold.desc:
Choose 1 of 4 Artifacts.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

gold.name: Preparation II
gold.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 45 Health, 3% Attack Damage, and 3 Ability Power every round. Champions start with 1 stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

gold.name: Prizefighter
gold.desc: Gain 2 item components. Every 5 wins gives you an item component.

gold.name: Pumping Up II
gold.desc: Your team gains 8% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 1% more.

gold.name: Pyromaniac
gold.desc: Gain a Red Buff. Your Burns deal 50% increased damage.

gold.name: Raining Gold
gold.desc: Gain 8 gold now and 1 gold every round.

gold.name: Raining Gold+
gold.desc: Gain 18 gold now and 1 gold every round.

gold.name: ReinFOURcement
gold.desc: The next 4-cost champion you buy is instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain 12 gold.

gold.name: Replication
gold.desc: Choose 1 of 3 components. For the next 2 rounds, gain a copy of that component.

gold.name: Salvage Bin
gold.desc: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 7 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's items and Emblems).

gold.name: Salvage Bin+
gold.desc: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 4 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's items and Emblems).

gold.name: Sated Spellweaver
gold.desc: After casting an Ability, champions gain 15% Omnivamp for 3 seconds. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 500 Health.

gold.name: Scapegoat
gold.desc: Gain a Training Dummy and 4 gold. If it is the first to die each player combat, gain 1 gold.

gold.name: Scavenger
gold.desc: The first 5 enemy champions that are killed each combat grant a champion on your team a temporary completed item.

gold.name: Scoreboard Scrapper
gold.desc: Every round, if you're in the bottom 4, your team permanently gains 1.5% Attack Damage and Ability Power. If you're in the top 4, they have 10% more Health.

gold.name: Shop Glitch
gold.desc: During non-player combat rounds, your shop refreshes for free every 2.5 seconds for 28 seconds.

gold.name: Slammin'
gold.desc: Gain 1 random Component(s). After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than Consumables), gain 2 XP.

gold.name: Slammin'+
gold.desc: Gain 1 random component(s) and 10 XP now. After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than Consumables), gain 2 XP.

gold.name: Spear's Will
gold.desc: Your team gains 10% Attack Damage and 5 Mana. Gain a B.F. Sword.

gold.name: Spirit Link
gold.desc: Champions restore 5% of their max Health every 4 seconds. Increase the healing by 0.5% for every 10 missing player Health.

gold.name: Starry Night
gold.desc:
1-cost and 2-cost units in your shop have a chance to be 2-star. Gain 6 gold.
Chances increase with player level.

gold.name: Starry Night+
gold.desc:
1-cost and 2-cost units in your shop have a chance to be 2-star. Gain 8 gold.
Chances increase with player level.

gold.name: Support Cache
gold.desc: Choose 1 of 4 Support items.

gold.name: Teaming Up II
gold.desc: Gain 1 random Support item and 2 random 4-cost champions.

gold.name: Thorn-Plated Armor
gold.desc: Gain a Bramble Vest. Your Bramble Vests deal 1-180% more damage (based on Stage) and heal the holder for 30% of the damage dealt.

gold.name: Tomb Raider I
gold.desc: For the next 3 players eliminated, choose one of their completed items to keep.

gold.name: Tower Defense
gold.desc: Gain a Training Dummy equipped with a random emblem that fires ranged attacks at enemies. It upgrades as the game goes on.

gold.name: Trade Sector
gold.desc: Gain a free Shop reroll every round. Gain 4 gold.

gold.name: Trait Tracker
gold.desc: The first time you activate 8 non-unique traits for 1 combat, gain 5 random emblems.

gold.name: Trifecta I
gold.desc: Gain 2 3-cost champions. Combat Start: 3 random 3-cost champions gain 220 Health and 20% Attack Speed.

gold.name: Two Much Value
gold.desc: Gain 1 reroll for every 2 unique two-cost champions fielded last combat. Gain 2 two-cost unit.

gold.name: Two Trick
gold.desc: Gain a random 2-star two-cost and 2 random 2-star one-cost champions.

gold.name: Vampiric Vitality
gold.desc: You heal for 12% of the damage you deal to enemy Tacticians. Your units gain 12% Omnivamp.

gold.name: Wandering Trainer I
gold.desc: Gain a Training Dummy with 2 permanently attached Emblems. Gain 1 gold.

gold.name: Warpath
gold.desc: Gain a 2-star 2-cost champion. After dealing 80 player damage, gain a chest of high cost champions and items.

gold.name: Worth the Wait
gold.desc: Gain a random two-star 1-cost champion. After 2 rounds, gain another copy of them at the start of each round for the rest of the game.

gold.name: 10,000 IQ
gold.desc: Every 5 rounds with Strategist active, bet whether you'll win more or lose more. After those rounds, gain 4 gold. If you're correct, gain a completed item Anvil. Gain a Yuumi and an Ekko.

gold.name: Alter Ego
gold.desc: Gain a Rhaast. Your strongest Rhaast enters Shadow Assassin form and his ability is replaced with a dash and 1 hex spin. If it kills, he immediately casts again.

gold.name: Anima Squad Crest
gold.desc: Gain an Anima Squad Emblem.

gold.name: Bastion Crest
gold.desc: Gain an Bastion emblem.

gold.name: Board of Directors
gold.desc: If you have 3 or fewer Divinicorp champions, their bonuses are increased by 50% + 0% for each Stage. Gain a Rhaast and a Morgana.

gold.name: BoomBot Crest
gold.desc: Gain a BoomBot emblem.

gold.name: Bruiser Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Bruiser emblem.

gold.name: Capacitor
gold.desc: When Techies cast, grant the lowest Health Techie a Shield equal to 200% of the Mana spent. Gain a Veigar and a Zyra.

gold.name: Cognitive Implant
gold.desc: Your Techies gain 5 Ability Power, increased by 1 for every 2 takedowns. Gain a Veigar and a Zyra.

gold.name: Cower, Weaklings!
gold.desc: Cyberboss abilities reduce the target's max Health by 20%. Cyberbosses take 20% less damage from enemies with less max Health. Gain a Poppy and a Veigar.

gold.name: Cutpurse
gold.desc: Executioners have a 4% chance to drop a gold when their attacks critically strike. Gain a Graves and Rengar.

gold.name: Cyberdeck
gold.desc: On combat start, 1 of your Exotech units with 2 items gains their ideal Exotech item. Gain a Jax and Naafiri.

gold.name: Divine Ascension
gold.desc: After 12 seconds your Divinicorp champions ascend, gaining 20% Health and 30% Attack Speed. Gain a Rhaast and a Morgana.

gold.name: Divinicorp Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Divinicorp emblem.

gold.name: Dummy With A Gun
gold.desc: With Syndicate active, your Training Dummies shoot enemies. Every 2 times they attack, grant the Kingpins 2% Attack Damage and Ability Power. Gain 1 Training Dummy, a Darius, and a Twisted Fate.

gold.name: Dynamo Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Dynamo emblem.

gold.name: Executioner Crest
gold.desc: Gain an Executioner emblem.

gold.name: Exotech Crest
gold.desc: Gain an Exotech emblem.

gold.name: Flatline
gold.desc: Marksmen execute enemies under 10% Health. Every time a Marksman executes, all Marksman gain 4% Attack Speed. Gain a Jhin and a Kindred.

gold.name: Freestyling
gold.desc: Clear all painted hexes. When Street Demons start combat on a non-tagged hex, tag it. After all hexes are tagged, gain 25 gold. Gain 3 Street Demons.

gold.name: Golden Fleece
gold.desc: Each Golden Ox drops 1 gold after fighting 2 rounds. Your max interest is 7. Gain a Graves, an Alistar, and 1 gold.

gold.name: Golden Fleece+
gold.desc: Each Golden Ox drops 1 gold after fighting 2 rounds. Your max interest is 7. Gain a Graves, an Alistar, and 4 gold.

gold.name: Golden Ox Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Golden Ox emblem.

gold.name: Hostile Takeover
gold.desc: Cypher gains 75% of its combat bonus now. Gain 200% Intel from kills, but only 30% from losses. Gain a Draven.

gold.name: Keep Your Friends Close
gold.desc: Syndicate Kingpins gain 10% Attack Speed and 120 Health for each adjacent ally in their row. The allies gain 175 Health. Gain a Twisted Fate and a Darius.

gold.name: Lethal Rerouting
gold.desc: Slayers above 50% Health gain 20% Attack Damage. While under 50%, they gain 15% Omnivamp. Gain a Vayne and a Shaco.

gold.name: Marksman Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Marksman emblem.

gold.name: Memory Bank
gold.desc: Gain a Jhin and Morgana. Dynamos gain 4% Damage Amp. After they spend 7000 Mana, gain a Zhonya's Paradox and an Aurora.

gold.name: New High Score
gold.desc: Cyberbosses increase their score when they deal damage. When they reach the next high score gain bonus loot. Gain a Veigar and a Poppy.

gold.name: Polished Chrome
gold.desc: When you 3-star Nitro champions, they gain 15% Attack Damage, 20 Ability Power, and grant 10 Gold. Gain a Kindred and a Nidalee.

gold.name: Power Leveling
gold.desc: Anima Squad takedowns have a 30% chance to drop an XP orb that sells for 1 XP. Anima Squad units gain 1% Attack Speed for each of your player levels. Gain a Seraphine and Illaoi.

gold.name: Rapidfire Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Rapidfire emblem.

gold.name: Reactive Shell
gold.desc: Vanguards gain 8% Health. When the Vanguard Shield ends, deal 50% of the initial Shield as magic damage to their current target. Gain a Skarner and a Vi.

gold.name: Reinforcing Skeleture
gold.desc:
Whenever a Bruiser dies, it permanently gains 55 Health.
Gain a Darius and Alistar.

gold.name: Slayer Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Slayer emblem.

gold.name: Speed Kills
gold.desc: Rapidfire champions start at 1 stacks and can go to 15. If you win combat within 18 seconds, gain 2 gold. Gain a Twisted Fate and a Kog'Maw.

gold.name: Strategist Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Strategist Emblem.

gold.name: Support Spire
gold.desc: After 10 seconds in combat, a support spire grants Anima Squad a Shield, Attack Speed, or Stuns all enemies. Gain 3 Anima Squad champions.

gold.name: Syndicate Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Syndicate emblem.

gold.name: Tagging Spree
gold.desc: Signature Street Demon hexes grant 5% Attack Speed. Gain 3 Street Demons and 2 Spray Can items that create signature Street Demon hexes.

gold.name: Techie Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Techie emblem.

gold.name: The Chug Bug
gold.desc: Gain 1 Gragas. Your strongest Gragas's attacks have a chance to knockback and deal bonus magic damage. His ability heals and empowers his next attack.

gold.name: The Chug Bug+
gold.desc: Gain 2 Gragas. Your strongest Gragas's attacks have a chance to knockback and deal bonus magic damage. His ability heals and empowers his next attack.

gold.name: Transference
gold.desc: When A.M.P. champions die, the nearest A.M.P. champion gains 1 Amp until the end of combat. Gain a Naafiri and a Nidalee.

gold.name: Transistor
gold.desc: When Bastions' start of combat bonus ends, 50% of it converts into Attack Damage and Ability Power and they gain 50% Attack Speed. Gain an Illaoi and Jax.

gold.name: Trial Run
gold.desc: Gain an Exotech Golem with a copy of each of your Exotech items. Gain a Jhin and a Naafiri.

gold.name: Vanguard Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Vanguard Emblem.

gold.name: Hunter Killer Missile
gold.desc: Every 6 Boombot rockets, fire an HK Missile at the current target that deals 350% of the original rocket's damage. Gain a Kog'Maw and a Skarner.

gold.name: Heroic Grab Bag+
gold.desc:
Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators. Gain 9 gold.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

gold.name: Heroic Grab Bag++
gold.desc:
Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators. Gain 13 gold.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

gold.name: Cyper Crest
gold.desc: Gain a Cyper emblem.

prismatic.name: An Exalted Adventure
prismatic.desc: Gain three 2-cost champions. If you 3-star two of them, gain an orb filled with loot. Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator at the start of next 2 stages.

prismatic.name: Caretaker's Chosen
prismatic.desc:
As you level, gain more powerful items.
Level 4: component anvil
Level 6: completed item anvil
Level 7: choose 1 of 5 Radiant items

prismatic.name: Belt Overflow
prismatic.desc: Gain 5 Giant's Belts. Your Giant's Belts grant +60 bonus Health.

prismatic.name: Binary Airdrop
prismatic.desc: Combat start: Up to 4 champions holding 2 items gain a recommended 3rd completed item.

prismatic.name: Birthday Present
prismatic.desc: Gain a 2-star champion and 1 gold every time you level up. The champion's cost tier is your level minus 4 (max: 5-cost).

prismatic.name: Blazing Soul II
prismatic.desc: Combat start: Your highest Attack Speed champion gains 35 Ability Power and 35% Attack Speed. Repeat on another ally every 3 seconds.

prismatic.name: Blinding Speed
prismatic.desc:
Gain a Giant Slayer, Guinsoo's Rageblade, a Recurve Bow and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Attack Carries!

prismatic.name: Bronze For Life II
prismatic.desc: Your team gains 4% Damage Amp and 1% Durability for each Bronze-tier trait.

prismatic.name: Build a Bud!
prismatic.desc: Gain a random 3-star 1-cost champion. Gain 8 gold.

prismatic.name: Buried Treasures III
prismatic.desc: Gain a random item component at the start of the next 6 rounds (including this round).

prismatic.name: Bulky Buddies III
prismatic.desc: Allies that start combat next to exactly 1 other ally gain 300 Health. When that champion dies, the other gains a 18% max Health Shield for 10 seconds.

prismatic.name: Calculated Enhancement
prismatic.desc: Each combat, 4 random champions in your last two rows gain 40% Attack Damage and 50 Ability Power.

prismatic.name: Call to Chaos
prismatic.desc: Gain a powerful and random reward.

prismatic.name: Final Ascension
prismatic.desc: Your team gains 15% Damage Amp. After 15 seconds, this increases to 45% Damage Amp.

prismatic.name: Coronation
prismatic.desc: Gain a Tactician's Crown. Tactician's Crown, Shield, and Cape grant the holder an additional 20% Attack Speed, 25% Attack Damage, and 30 Ability Power.

prismatic.name: Cursed Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain +2 max team size, but take 100% more player damage when you lose a player combat.

prismatic.name: Cybernetic Bulk III
prismatic.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 500 Health.

prismatic.name: Cybernetic Implants III
prismatic.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 200 Health and 30% Attack Damage.

prismatic.name: Cybernetic Uplink III
prismatic.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 180 Health and restore 3 Mana per second.

prismatic.name: Spoils of War III
prismatic.desc: Enemies have a 45% chance to drop loot when killed.

prismatic.name: Dual Purpose
prismatic.desc: The first time you buy XP each round, gain 2 gold. Whenever you buy XP, reroll your Shop.

prismatic.name: Expected Unexpectedness
prismatic.desc: Now and at the start of the next 2 stages, roll 3 dice. Gain various rewards based on their total.

prismatic.name: Final Polish
prismatic.desc: Gain a Support Anvil and a completed item anvil.

prismatic.name: Final Reserves
prismatic.desc: The first time you would be eliminated, you instead remain alive. After this happens, gain 30 XP and set your gold to 90. Excess gold is converted to XP.

prismatic.name: Flexible
prismatic.desc: Gain 1 random emblem. At the start of every Stage, gain a random emblem. Your team gains 20 Health for each emblem they are holding.

prismatic.name: Flurry of Blows
prismatic.desc: Gain a Zeke's Herald. Champions buffed by Zeke's also gain 45% Critical Strike Chance.

prismatic.name: Prismatic Ticket
prismatic.desc: Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a 45% chance to gain a free reroll.

prismatic.name: Gargantuan Resolve
prismatic.desc: Gain a Titan's Resolve and another after 2 player combats. Your Titan's Resolves can continue stacking to 50 instead of 25. The total resist bonus is increased by 80%.

prismatic.name: Going Long
prismatic.desc:
You no longer gain interest. Gain 15 gold now. Round start: gain 4 XP.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

prismatic.name: Greater Moonlight
prismatic.desc: Combat Start: 1 random 1-cost champion is upgraded to 4-star for that round and gains 5% Attack Damage and 5 Ability Power.

prismatic.name: Hard Commit
prismatic.desc: Gain a random emblem. Now and at the start of each stage, gain a 1-star champion of that trait with a cost equal to the Stage (max 5) and 2 gold.

prismatic.name: Hedge Fund
prismatic.desc:
Gain 25 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

prismatic.name: Shopping Spree
prismatic.desc: When you level up, gain a number of free shop refreshes equal to your level+1. Gain 2 gold.

prismatic.name: High End Shopping II
prismatic.desc: Champions appear in your Shop as if you were 1 level higher. Gain 12 gold.

prismatic.name: Immovable Object
prismatic.desc: Gain a Randuin's Omen. Its range is increased by 1 hex and its effect is increased by 33%.

prismatic.name: I'm the Carry Now
prismatic.desc: Get a Golem with tailored offensive items. It gets stronger at the start of each Stage.

prismatic.name: Invested+
prismatic.desc: Gain 26 gold. At the start of each round, gain 1 Shop reroll for every 10 gold above 50 (max 80 gold).

prismatic.name: Invested++
prismatic.desc: Gain 45 gold. At the start of each round, gain 1 Shop reroll for every 10 gold above 50 (max 80 gold).

prismatic.name: Investment Strategy II
prismatic.desc: Your champions gain 8 permanent max health per interest you earn. Your max interest is increased to 7. Gain 3 gold.

prismatic.name: Living Forge
prismatic.desc:
Gain an Artifact anvil now and after every 10 player combats.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

prismatic.name: Lucky Gloves
prismatic.desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves.

prismatic.name: Lucky Gloves+
prismatic.desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves.

prismatic.name: Luden's Echo III
prismatic.desc: Every 60 Mana spent, your units next instance of Ability damage deals an additional 110-300 (based on current Stage) magic damage to the target and a nearby enemy.

prismatic.name: Max Cap
prismatic.desc: Your max level is 7. Gain 1 Tactician's Shield which increases your team size by +1, and 40 gold.

prismatic.name: Level Up!
prismatic.desc: When you buy XP, gain an additional 2. Gain 12 immediately.

prismatic.name: One Buff, Two Buff
prismatic.desc: Gain a Red Buff, a Blue Buff, and a Champion Duplicator.

prismatic.name: Endless Hordes
prismatic.desc: Gain +3 maximum team size, but your units can only hold 1 item and their total health is reduced by 12%. Gain 8 gold.

prismatic.name: Endless Hordes +
prismatic.desc: Gain +3 maximum team size, but your units can only hold 1 item and their total health is reduced by 12%. Gain 18 gold.

prismatic.name: Pandora's Items III
prismatic.desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain 1 random Radiant item.

prismatic.name: Phreaky Friday
prismatic.desc:
Gain an Infinity Force. After 5 player combats, gain another.

Infinity Force: Artifact that offers tons of offensive and defensive stats

prismatic.name: Phreaky Friday +
prismatic.desc:
Gain an Infinity Force. After 3 player combats, gain another.

Infinity Force: Artifact that offers tons of offensive and defensive stats

prismatic.name: Piercing Lotus II
prismatic.desc: Your team gains 20% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike. Critical strikes 20% Shred and Sunder the target for 3 seconds.

prismatic.name: Prismatic Pipeline
prismatic.desc: The next non-player combat round will drop an additional Prismatic Orb full of amazing loot.

prismatic.name: Pumping Up III
prismatic.desc: Your team gains 12% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 2% more.

prismatic.name: Quality Over Quantity
prismatic.desc:
Units holding exactly 1 item upgrade that item to Radiant. Units holding Radiant items gain 4% Health. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

Thief's Gloves counts as multiple items.

prismatic.name: Radiant Refactor
prismatic.desc:
Gain a Masterwork Upgrade and 1 component anvil.

Masterwork Upgrade upgrades an item to Radiant!

prismatic.name: Radiant Relics
prismatic.desc:
Choose 1 of 5 Radiant items. Gain a Magnetic Remover.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

prismatic.name: Roll The Dice
prismatic.desc:
Gain a Radiant Thief's Gloves item. This equips 2 random Radiant items every round.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

prismatic.name: Cruel Pact
prismatic.desc: Buying XP costs 6 player health instead of 4 gold. Heal 4 player health before each player combat.

prismatic.name: Scoped Weapons II
prismatic.desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain infinite Attack Range and 25% Attack Speed.

prismatic.name: Shimmerscale Essence
prismatic.desc:
Gain a Mogul's Mail. In 5 rounds, gain a Gamblers Blade.

These items give gold as well as combat power.

prismatic.name: Sponging
prismatic.desc: Combat start: Up to 6 champions with 1 or fewer items gain a copy of a random completed item from the nearest itemized ally.

prismatic.name: Subscription Service
prismatic.desc: Now, and at the start of each Stage, open a Shop of 4 unique 4-cost champions and gain 8 gold.

prismatic.name: Sword Overflow
prismatic.desc: Gain 5 BF Swords. Your BF Swords grant +2% Attack Speed.

prismatic.name: Tactician's Kitchen
prismatic.desc: Gain a random Emblem. After 6 player combats, gain a Tactician's Cape.

prismatic.name: Think Fast
prismatic.desc: Shop rerolls are free until the end of this round. Traits and other augments do not benefit from these free Shops. Gain 3 gold.

prismatic.name: Wise Spending
prismatic.desc: Every 2 times you purchase a shop reroll, gain 4 XP. Gain 1 gold now.

prismatic.name: Tiniest Titan
prismatic.desc: Gain 2 player health and 1 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

prismatic.name: Tiniest Titan+
prismatic.desc: Gain 2 player health and 1 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster. Gain 15 gold now.

prismatic.name: Tomb Raider II
prismatic.desc: Gain 1 completed item Anvil. Every time a player is eliminated, choose one of their completed items to keep.

prismatic.name: Trifecta II
prismatic.desc: Gain 3 3-cost champions. Allies gain 5% Attack Speed. Combat Start: 3 random 3-cost champions gain 300 Health and 25% Attack Speed.

prismatic.name: Double Trouble III
prismatic.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 40% Attack Damage and 40 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

prismatic.name: Upward Mobility
prismatic.desc: Buying XP costs 1 less. Gain 2 Health and 2 free rerolls whenever you level up.

prismatic.name: Void Swarm
prismatic.desc: Gain a Zz'Rot Portal and another after every 10 player combats. Zz'Rot Portal Voidlings gain 30% Attack Speed and 30% Omnivamp.

prismatic.name: Wandering Trainer II
prismatic.desc: Gain a Training Dummy with 3 permanently attached Emblems. Gain 6 gold.

prismatic.name: Wand Overflow
prismatic.desc: Gain 5 Needlessly Large Rods. Your Needlessly Large Rods grant +5% Attack Speed.

prismatic.name: Woodland Charm
prismatic.desc: Your highest Health champion is cloned. The clone has 25% bonus Health and 30% bonus Attack Speed but cannot equip items.

prismatic.name: Worth the Wait II
prismatic.desc: Gain a random 2-cost champion. Gain another copy of them at the start of each round for the rest of the game.

prismatic.name: Anima Squad Circlet
prismatic.desc: Gain an Anima Squad Emblem and a Yuumi.

prismatic.name: Anima Squad Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain an Anima Squad Emblem, an Adaptive Helm, and an Illaoi.

prismatic.name: Axiom Arc III
prismatic.desc: Your units gain 15 Mana on kill. Gain a completed item Anvil.

prismatic.name: Bastion Circlet
prismatic.desc: Gain a Bastion Emblem, a Sejuani, and a Giant's Belt.

prismatic.name: Bastion Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Bastion Emblem, a Steadfast Heart, and an Illaoi.

prismatic.name: Blue Battery III
prismatic.desc: Gain a Blue Buff. Your units gain 5 Ability Power. After casting their Ability, gain 5 Mana.

prismatic.name: BoomBot Circlet
prismatic.desc: Gain a BoomBot Emblem and a Fiddlesticks.

prismatic.name: BoomBot Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a BoomBot Emblem, an Ionic Spark, and a Skarner.

prismatic.name: Bruiser Circlet
prismatic.desc: Gain a Bruiser Emblem, a Gragas, and a Giant's Belt.

prismatic.name: Bruiser Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Bruiser Emblem, a Crownguard, and a Darius.

prismatic.name: Chemtech Overdrive
prismatic.desc: Open 3 portals to Zaun on random hexes in the second row. Any unit that starts combat in a portal gains 450 Health and 35% Attack Speed, and drops 1 gold on death.

prismatic.name: Divinicorp Circlet
prismatic.desc: Gain a Divinicorp Emblem and a Senna.

prismatic.name: Divinicorp Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Divinicorp Emblem, a Spirit Visage, and a Rhaast.

prismatic.name: Dominance
prismatic.desc: For every 2 surviving champions after winning a player combat, gain 1 gold. Gain 16 XP.

prismatic.name: Dynamo Circlet
prismatic.desc: Gain a Dynamo Emblem, a Miss Fortune, and a BF Sword.

prismatic.name: Dynamo Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Dynamo Emblem, a Spear of Shojin, and an Elise.

prismatic.name: Executioner Circlet
prismatic.desc: Gain an Executioner Emblem, a Vex, and a Sparring Gloves.

prismatic.name: Executioner Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain an Executioner Emblem, a Striker's Flail, and a Graves.

prismatic.name: Exotech Circlet
prismatic.desc: Gain an Exotech Emblem and a Mordekaiser.

prismatic.name: Exotech Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain an Exotech Emblem, a Guinsoo's Rageblade, and a Naafiri.

prismatic.name: Golden Ox Circlet
prismatic.desc: Gain a Golden Ox Emblem and a Jarvan.

prismatic.name: Golden Ox Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Golden Ox Emblem, a Nashor's Tooth, and a Graves.

prismatic.name: Lifelong Learning
prismatic.desc: Your units gain 2% health every round. If they survive combat, they gain an additional 3 Ability Power and 3% Attack Damage.

prismatic.name: Marksman Circlet
prismatic.desc: Gain a Marskman Emblem, an Aphelios, and a Recurve Bow.

prismatic.name: Marksman Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Marksman Emblem, an Infinity Edge, and a Jhin.

prismatic.name: Pirates
prismatic.desc: Your units have a rare chance to drop treasure chests when they kill enemy champions.

prismatic.name: Rapidfire Circlet
prismatic.desc: Gain a Rapidfire Emblem, a Zeri, and a BF Sword.

prismatic.name: Rapidfire Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Rapidfire Emblem, a Giant Slayer, and a Twisted Fate.

prismatic.name: Share the Spotlight
prismatic.desc: Gain a spotlight in the back corner of your board. All units in the spotlight gain 14% Damage Amp, 12% Omnivamp, and 2 Mana per second.

prismatic.name: Slayer Circlet
prismatic.desc: Gain a Slayer Emblem, a Zed, and a Sparring Gloves.

prismatic.name: Slayer Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Slayer Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Vayne.

prismatic.name: Strategist Circlet
prismatic.desc: Gain a Strategist Emblem, a Yuumi, and a Giant's Belt.

prismatic.name: Strategist Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Strategist Emblem, an Adaptive Helm, and an Ekko.

prismatic.name: Street Demon Circlet
prismatic.desc: Gain a Street Demon Emblem and a Jinx.

prismatic.name: Street Demon Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Street Demon Emblem, a Striker's Flail, and an Ekko.

prismatic.name: Syndicate Circlet
prismatic.desc: Gain a Syndicate Emblem and a Braum.

prismatic.name: Syndicate Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Syndicate Emblem, an Infinity Edge, and a Darius.

prismatic.name: Techie Circlet
prismatic.desc: Gain a Techie Emblem, a Brand, and a Tear of the Goddess.

prismatic.name: Techie Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Techie Emblem, a Jeweled Gauntlet, and a Shyvana.

prismatic.name: Titanic Strength
prismatic.desc: Your team gains 1.25% of their max Health as Attack Damage and 1.25% of their max Health as Ability Power.

prismatic.name: Unstable Evolution
prismatic.desc: Your champions randomly gain one of the following when they are starred up: 360 Health, 36% Attack Speed, 36% Attack Damage, or 36 Ability Power.

prismatic.name: Vanguard Circlet
prismatic.desc: Gain a Vanguard Emblem, a Leona, and a Giant's Belt.

prismatic.name: Vanguard Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Vanguard Emblem, a Protector's Vow, and a Skarner.

prismatic.name: Gargantuan Resolve
prismatic.desc: Gain a Titan's Resolve and another after 1 player combats. Your Titan's Resolves can continue stacking to 50 instead of 25. The total resist bonus is increased by 80%.

prismatic.name: Cyper Crown
prismatic.desc: Gain a Cypher Emblem, a Giant Slayer, and a Leblanc.
